title: Expense
description:
Expenses are defined as costs incurred as part of a project, but not related to time. Once created, expenses can
be included in generated invoices.

amount_in_cents.description: The amount, in cents, of the expense.

category.description:
The category of the expense (can be any string). Built-in categories are:
Travel, Mileage, Lodging, Food, Entertainment, and Other.

currency_base_unit.description: The number of the units in the `amount_as_cents` attribute that are required to make up a single unit of the `currency`.

currency_symbol.description: The symbol that represents the currency of the expense.

date.description: The date the expense was incurred.

expense_category_id.description: `expense_category_id` will only be included in the response if `expense_category` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

external_reference_ids.description: `external_reference_ids` will only be included in the response if `external_references` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

is_billable.description: Whether this is a billable expense.

is_invoiced.description: Whether this expense has been included on an invoice.

notes.description: All notes that have been added to the expense.

receipt_id.description: `receipt_id` will only be included in the response if `receipt` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

reimbursable.description: Whether this expense is reimbursable to the creator or to a vendor.

role_id.description: `role_id` will only be included in the response if `role` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

story_id.description: `story_id` will only be included in the response if `story` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

taxable.description: Whether this expense is marked as taxable when invoiced.

user_can_edit.description: Whether the viewing user can edit this expense.

user_id.description: `user_id` will only be included in the response if `user` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

vendor_id.description: `vendor_id` will only be included in the response if `vendor` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.

workspace_id.description: `workspace_id` will only be included in the response if `workspace` is in the list of included associations. See include section for usage.
